import React, { useState } from 'react' import './ExpenseForm.css' const ExpenseForm = () => { const [userDate, setUserDate] = useState({ title: '', amount: '', date: '' }) const onChangeHandler = (event, key) => { setUserDate({ ...userDate, [key]: event.target.value }) } return (
onChangeHandler('title')}/>
onChangeHandler('amount', e)} />
onChangeHandler('date', e)} />
) } export default ExpenseForm
